content: Reviewed my trading journal today. Noticed patterns in my mistakes. Implemented a new checklist to avoid future coding errors. The city's relentless pace demands precision.
My mentor and I discussed potential job openings at his firm. He thinks I'm ready to take the next step. Excitement mixed with nerves.
Got an interview call from the quant firm! The mentorship has truly paid off. Now, to prepare for what could be a life-changing conversation.
Nailed the interview! They're impressed with my work on the open-source project and my trading algorithm. Next step: job offer. The city's dreams are starting to feel within reach.
Spent the weekend diving into reinforcement learning. The idea of algorithms learning from their environment is both fascinating and relevant to trading.
Just got word—my risk management protocols passed the firm's stress test with flying colors. They're offering me a position! The skyline has never looked so promising.
Signed the contract today. I'm officially a quant trader. The journey from simulation to reality has been wild. Now, to celebrate with a view of the city that made this possible.
